data.comment: The match is underway at Stadio Friuli.
Crotone have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 2, Antonio Di Martino signals a Udinese throw-in in Crotone's half.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Udinese.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
In the minute 4, Udinese have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
Udinese's Kevin Bonifazi misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Friuli.
Antonio Di Martino signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Crotone's area.
In Udine a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 8, Samir is booked for the home team.
In Udine, Simeon Nwankwo (Crotone) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Udinese in the half of Crotone.
Udinese are whistled for offside.
Udinese will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Crotone.
In the minute 14, Crotone's Junior Messias is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 15, Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 18, Tolgay Arslan of Udinese smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Udinese have a goal kick.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 20, It's a goal kick for the home team in Udine.
Antonio Di Martino blows against Udinese's Ignacio Pussetto for offside.
Antonio Di Martino awards Crotone a goal kick.
In the minute 25, In Udine Udinese's Ignacio Pussetto is caught offside.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 27, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Udinese!
Junior Messias (Crotone) has received a yellow card from Antonio Di Martino.
In the minute 29, Rodrigo De Paul (Udinese) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Antonio Di Martino awards the home team a throw-in.
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Udinese pushes forward through Ilija Nestorovski, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 33, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Udinese's Rodrigo De Paul gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Crotone defender.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Udinese to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Crotone have a goal kick.
Antonio Di Martino signals a Udinese throw-in in Crotone's half.
In the minute 37, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Udinese.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 39, Free kick Udinese.
At Stadio Friuli, Jacopo Petriccione has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Junior Messias of Crotone gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 42, Antonio Di Martino awards Udinese a goal kick.
Udinese drive upfield and Ignacio Pussetto gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Crotone defender.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 44, Rodrigo De Paul is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
At Stadio Friuli the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Udinese's Rodrigo De Paul looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 45, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, In Udine Udinese drive forward through Ilija Nestorovski. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 48, Udinese's Tolgay Arslan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Friuli.
Throw-in Crotone.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Udine to check on Arkadiusz Reca, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 53, Arkadiusz Reca is back on his feet again.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Udine Crotone attack through Pedro Pereira. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Eduardo Henrique is replacing Emmanuel Riviere for the away team.
In the minute 56, Crotone needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Eduardo Henrique for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 60, Udinese have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
Nahuel Molina gets his shot on target but fails to score for Udinese.
Antonio Di Martino awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Udinese have a goal kick.
Nahuel Molina for Udinese drives towards goal at Stadio Friuli. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
Antonio Di Martino awards Crotone a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Ilija Nestorovski with Gerard Deulofeu. This is the first substitution made today by Luca Gotti.
In the minute 66, Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Udinese are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Udinese drives forward and Ignacio Pussetto gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 72, Throw-in high up the field for Udinese in Udine.
Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
In the minute 75, Udinese's Ignacio Pussetto gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Friuli. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 77, Udinese are in shooting range from this free kick.
Eduardo Henrique (Crotone) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a second substitution, with Jens Stryger Larsen replacing Nahuel Molina.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Gerard Deulofeu of Udinese is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 82, Denis Dragus is on a sub for Junior Messias for Crotone.
The away team replace Jacopo Petriccione with Niccolo Zanellato.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in Crotone.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Friuli.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Denis Dragus (Crotone) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in Udinese.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Rodrigo De Paul (Udinese) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Antonio Di Martino.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Antonio Di Martino signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crotone's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Antonio Di Martino blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
